ModMetaData.name: Biocoder & Biodecoder
ModMetaData.author: Local Ghost
ModMetaData.description:
Add biocoder and biodecoder to the game.
Biocoder: add user's biocode to the item (cannot use on items which can be bonded, i.e. persona weapons, or have biocode already).
Biodecoder: remove biocode or bond from the item.
The combat supplier sells biocoders, and the exotic goods trader sells both of them.
